67 TtlInterfaceCore::TtlInterfaceCore(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
68 {
69  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore - ctor");
70 
71  init(nh);
72 }
73 
77 TtlInterfaceCore::~TtlInterfaceCore()
78 {
79  if (_control_loop_thread.joinable())
80  _control_loop_thread.join();
81 }
82 
86 bool TtlInterfaceCore::init(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
87 {
88  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::init - Init parameters...");
89  initParameters(nh);
90 
91  _ttl_manager = std::make_unique<TtlManager>(nh);
92  _ttl_manager->scanAndCheck();
93  startControlLoop();
94 
95  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::init - Starting services...");
96  startServices(nh);
97 
98  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::init - Starting publishers...");
99  startPublishers(nh);
100 
101  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::init - Starting subscribers...");
102  startSubscribers(nh);
103 
104  return true;
105 }
106 
110 void TtlInterfaceCore::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
111 {
112  _control_loop_frequency = 0.0;
113  double write_frequency = 0.0;
114  double read_data_frequency = 0.0;
115  double read_end_effector_frequency = 0.0;
116  double read_status_frequency = 0.0;
117 
118  nh.getParam("ttl_hardware_control_loop_frequency", _control_loop_frequency);
119 
120  nh.getParam("ttl_hardware_write_frequency", write_frequency);
121 
122  nh.getParam("ttl_hardware_read_data_frequency", read_data_frequency);
123 
124  nh.getParam("ttl_hardware_read_end_effector_frequency", read_end_effector_frequency);
125 
126  nh.getParam("ttl_hardware_read_status_frequency", read_status_frequency);
127 
128  nh.getParam("hardware_version", _hardware_version);
129 
130  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::initParameters - ttl_hardware_control_loop_frequency : %f", _control_loop_frequency);
131  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::initParameters - ttl_hardware_write_frequency : %f", write_frequency);
132  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::initParameters - ttl_hardware_read_data_frequency : %f", read_data_frequency);
133  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::initParameters - ttl_hardware_read_end_effector_frequency : %f", read_end_effector_frequency);
134  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::initParameters - ttl_hardware_read_status_frequency : %f", read_status_frequency);
135  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::initParameters - hardware_version : %s", _hardware_version.c_str());
136 
137  _delta_time_data_read = 1.0 / read_data_frequency;
138  _delta_time_end_effector_read = 1.0 / read_end_effector_frequency;
139  _delta_time_status_read = 1.0 / read_status_frequency;
140  _delta_time_write = 1.0 / write_frequency;
141 }
142 
147 void TtlInterfaceCore::startServices(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
148 {
149  // advertise services
150  _activate_leds_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/ttl_driver/set_dxl_leds", &TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackActivateLeds, this);
151 
152  _custom_cmd_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/ttl_driver/send_custom_value", &TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackWriteCustomValue, this);
153 
154  _custom_cmd_getter = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/ttl_driver/read_custom_value", &TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackReadCustomValue, this);
155 
156  _pid_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/ttl_driver/read_pid_value", &TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackReadPIDValue, this);
157 
158  _pid_getter = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/ttl_driver/write_pid_value", &TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackWritePIDValue, this);
159 
160  _velocity_profile_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/ttl_driver/read_velocity_profile", &TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackReadVelocityProfile, this);
161 
162  _velocity_profile_getter = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/ttl_driver/write_velocity_profile", &TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackWriteVelocityProfile, this);
163 }

169 void TtlInterfaceCore::startPublishers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
170 {
171  _collision_status_publisher = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("/niryo_robot/end_effector_interface/collision_detected", 1, true);
172  _collision_status_publisher_timer = nh.createTimer(_collision_status_publisher_duration, &TtlInterfaceCore::_publishCollisionStatus, this);
173 }

189 bool TtlInterfaceCore::rebootHardware(const std::shared_ptr<common::model::AbstractHardwareState> &hw_state)
190 {
191  int result = COMM_TX_FAIL;
192 
193  if (hw_state && hw_state->isValid())
194  {
195  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::rebootHardware - Reboot hardware %d", static_cast<int>(hw_state->getId()));
196  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
197  result = _ttl_manager->rebootHardware(hw_state->getId());
198  ros::Duration(1.5).sleep();
199  }
200 
201  // return true if result is COMM_SUCCESS
202  return (COMM_SUCCESS == result);
203 }
204 
209 vector<uint8_t> TtlInterfaceCore::scanTools()
210 {
211  vector<uint8_t> motor_list;
212  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
213  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::scanTools - Scan tools...");
214  int result = COMM_PORT_BUSY;
215 
216  for (int counter = 0; counter < 50 && COMM_SUCCESS != result; ++counter)
217  {
218  result = _ttl_manager->getAllIdsOnBus(motor_list);
219  ROS_DEBUG_COND(COMM_SUCCESS != result, "Driver::scanTools status: %d (counter: %d)", result, counter);
220  ros::Duration(TIME_TO_WAIT_IF_BUSY).sleep();
221  }
222  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::scanTools - Result getAllIdsOnDxlBus: %d", result);
223 
224  ostringstream ss;
225  for (auto const &m : motor_list)
226  ss << static_cast<int>(m) << " ";
227  string motor_id_list_string = ss.str();
228  if (!motor_id_list_string.empty())
229  motor_id_list_string.pop_back(); // remove trailing " "
230 
231  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::scanTools - All id on bus: [%s]", motor_id_list_string.c_str());
232  return motor_list;
233 }
234 
240 int TtlInterfaceCore::motorScanReport(uint8_t motor_id)
241 {
242  if (_debug_flag)
243  {
244  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
245  if (_ttl_manager->ping(motor_id))
246  {
247  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorScanReport - Debug - Motor %d found", motor_id);
248  }
249  else
250  {
251  ROS_ERROR("TtlInterfaceCore::motorScanReport - Debug - Motor %d not found", motor_id);
252  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
253  }
254  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
255  }
256  ROS_ERROR("TtlInterfaceCore::motorScanReport - Debug mode not enabled");
257  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::ABORTED;
258 }
259 
266 int TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport(const JointState &jState, EHardwareType motor_type)
267 {
268  int ret = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::ABORTED;
269 
270  if (motor_type != EHardwareType::UNKNOWN)
271  {
272  if (_debug_flag)
273  {
274  uint8_t motor_id = jState.getId();
275 
276  // torque on
277  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
278  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - Send torque on command to motor %d", motor_id);
279  if (motor_type == EHardwareType::STEPPER || motor_type == EHardwareType::FAKE_STEPPER_MOTOR)
280  {
281  ret = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
282  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport: Implement in case we have stepper");
283  }
284  else
285  {
286  _ttl_manager->writeSingleCommand(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{1}));
287  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
288 
289  // set position to old position + 200
290  uint32_t old_position = _ttl_manager->getPosition(jState);
291  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - get dxl %d pose: %d ", motor_id, old_position);
292  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
293 
294  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - Send dxl %d pose: %d ", motor_id, old_position + 200);
295  _ttl_manager->writeSingleCommand(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{old_position + 200}));
296  ros::Duration(2).sleep();
297 
298  // set position back to old position
299  uint32_t new_position = _ttl_manager->getPosition(jState);
300  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - get dxl %d pose: %d ", motor_id, new_position);
301  int rest = static_cast<int>(new_position - old_position);
302  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
303 
304  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore - Debug - Send dxl %d pose: %d ", motor_id, old_position);
305  _ttl_manager->writeSingleCommand(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{old_position}));
306  ros::Duration(2).sleep();
307  uint32_t new_position2 = _ttl_manager->getPosition(jState);
308  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - get ttl motor %d pose: %d ", motor_id, new_position2);
309  int rest2 = static_cast<int>(new_position2 - new_position);
310  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
311 
312  // torque off
313  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - Send torque off command on ttl motor %d", motor_id);
314  _ttl_manager->writeSingleCommand(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{0}));
315 
316  if (abs(rest) < 50 || abs(rest2) < 50)
317  {
318  ROS_WARN("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - Dynamixel Motor %d problem", motor_id);
319  ret = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
320  }
321  else
322  {
323  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - Dynamixel Motor %d OK", motor_id);
324  ret = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
325  }
326  }
327  }
328  else
329  {
330  ROS_ERROR("TtlInterfaceCore::motorCmdReport - Debug - Debug mode not enabled");
331  }
332  }
333 
334  return ret;
335 }
336 
341 int TtlInterfaceCore::launchMotorsReport()
342 {
343  int response = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
344  unsigned int nbSuccess = 0;
345  unsigned int nbFailure = 0;
346 
347  std::vector<std::tuple<uint8_t, EHardwareType, int, int>> results;
348 
349  if (_debug_flag)
350  {
351  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::launchMotorsReport - Debug - Start Motor Report");
352  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
353 
354  for (auto const &state : _ttl_manager->getMotorsStates())
355  {
356  if (state)
357  {
358  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::launchMotorsReport - Debug - Motor %d report start :", static_cast<int>(state->getId()));
359 
360  int scan_res = motorScanReport(state->getId());
361  int cmd_res = motorCmdReport(*state, state->getHardwareType());
362 
363  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == scan_res && niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == cmd_res)
364  {
365  nbSuccess++;
366  }
367  else
368  {
369  nbFailure++;
370  response = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
371  }
372 
373  results.emplace_back(state->getId(), state->getHardwareType(), scan_res, cmd_res);
374 
375  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::ABORTED == scan_res || niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::ABORTED == cmd_res)
376  {
377  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::launchMotorsReport - Debug - Debug motor aborted");
378  break;
379  }
380  }
381  }
382 
383  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
384  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::launchMotorsReport - Debug - Check for unflashed motors");
385 
386  // check if some id 1 are found (id = 1 is for unflashed dxl motors)
387  if (_ttl_manager->ping(1))
388  {
389  ROS_ERROR("TtlInterfaceCore::launchMotorsReport - Debug - Find an unflashed motor");
390  results.emplace_back(1, EHardwareType::UNKNOWN, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE);
391  response = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
392  nbFailure++;
393  }
394 
395  // display synthesis
396  ROS_INFO("Synthesis of motors report :");
397  ROS_INFO("--------");
398  ROS_INFO("Nb Success : %d, Nb Failure: %d", nbSuccess, nbFailure);
399  ROS_INFO("Details: ");
400  ROS_INFO("--------");
401  ROS_INFO("id \t| type \t| scan result | cmd result");
402 
403  for (auto const &res : results)
404  {
405  ROS_INFO("%d \t| %s \t| %d | %d", std::get<0>(res), HardwareTypeEnum(std::get<1>(res)).toString().c_str(), std::get<2>(res), std::get<3>(res));
406  }
407  }
408  else
409  {
410  ROS_ERROR("TtlInterfaceCore::launchMotorsReport - Debug - Debug mode not enabled");
411  }
412 
413  return response;
414 }

441 void TtlInterfaceCore::startControlLoop()
442 {
443  resetHardwareControlLoopRates();
444  if (!_control_loop_flag)
445  {
446  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::startControlLoop - Start control loop");
447  _control_loop_flag = true;
448  _control_loop_thread = std::thread(&TtlInterfaceCore::controlLoop, this);
449  }
450 }

455 bool TtlInterfaceCore::scanMotorId(uint8_t motor_to_find)
456 {
457  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
458  return _ttl_manager->ping(motor_to_find);
459 }

495 void TtlInterfaceCore::resetHardwareControlLoopRates()
496 {
497  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::resetHardwareControlLoopRates - Reset control loop rates");
498  double now = ros::Time::now().toSec();
499  _time_hw_data_last_write = now;
500  _time_hw_data_last_read = now;
501  _time_hw_status_last_read = now;
502  _time_check_connection_last_read = now;
503  _time_check_end_effector_last_read = now;
504 }
505 
510 void TtlInterfaceCore::activeDebugMode(bool mode)
511 {
512  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::activeDebugMode - Activate debug mode for driver core: %d", mode);
513  _debug_flag = mode;
514  _control_loop_flag = !mode;
515 
516  if (mode)
517  {
518  _control_loop_mutex.lock();
519  }
520  else
521  {
522  _control_loop_mutex.unlock();
523  }
524 }
525 
529 void TtlInterfaceCore::controlLoop()
530 {
531  ros::Rate control_loop_rate = ros::Rate(_control_loop_frequency);
532  resetHardwareControlLoopRates();
533 
534  while (ros::ok())
535  {
536  if (!_debug_flag && !_estop_flag)
537  {
538  // 1. check connection status of motors
539  if (!_ttl_manager->isConnectionOk())
540  {
541  // clear all commands concerned move joints to avoid when a motor reconnected, it moves a little bit because of command unsent yet
542  _joint_trajectory_cmd.clear();
543 
544  // scan motors again
545  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(1.0, "TtlInterfaceCore::controlLoop - motor connection error");
546  ros::Duration(0.1).sleep();
547 
548  vector<uint8_t> missing_ids;
549 
550  int bus_state = COMM_PORT_BUSY;
551 
552  while (TTL_SCAN_OK != bus_state)
553  {
554  // scan and get removed motor
555  {
556  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
557  bus_state = _ttl_manager->scanAndCheck();
558  }
559 
560  if (bus_state == TTL_SCAN_OK)
561  break;
562 
563  missing_ids = getRemovedMotorList();
564 
565  std::string msg;
566  msg += "TtlInterfaceCore::controlLoop - motor";
567  for (auto const &id : missing_ids)
568  {
569  msg += " " + std::to_string(id);
570  }
571  msg += " do not seem to be connected";
572  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(1.0, "%s", msg.c_str());
573 
574  // still keep hardware status updated
575  _ttl_manager->readHardwareStatus();
576  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
577  }
578 
579  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::controlLoop - Bus is ok");
580  }
581 
582  if (_control_loop_flag)
583  {
584  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
585  if (ros::Time::now().toSec() - _time_hw_data_last_write >= _delta_time_write)
586  {
587  _executeCommand();
588  _time_hw_data_last_write = ros::Time::now().toSec();
589  }
590  if (ros::Time::now().toSec() - _time_hw_data_last_read >= _delta_time_data_read)
591  {
592  _ttl_manager->readJointsStatus();
593  _time_hw_data_last_read = ros::Time::now().toSec();
594  }
595  if (ros::Time::now().toSec() - _time_hw_status_last_read >= _delta_time_status_read)
596  {
597  _ttl_manager->readHardwareStatus();
598  _time_hw_status_last_read = ros::Time::now().toSec();
599  }
600  if (_ttl_manager->hasEndEffector() && ros::Time::now().toSec() - _time_hw_end_effector_last_read >= _delta_time_end_effector_read)
601  {
602  _ttl_manager->readEndEffectorStatus();
603  _time_hw_end_effector_last_read = ros::Time::now().toSec();
604  }
605  }
606  else
607  {
608  ros::Duration(TIME_TO_WAIT_IF_BUSY).sleep();
609  resetHardwareControlLoopRates();
610  }
611  control_loop_rate.sleep();
612  }
613  else
614  {
615  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
616  }
617  }
618 
619  if ("ned2" == _hardware_version || "ned3pro" == _hardware_version)
620  _ttl_manager->resetTorques();
621 }
622 
626 // create a unique queue using polymorphism
627 void TtlInterfaceCore::_executeCommand()
628 {
629  {
630  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_single_cmd_queue_mutex);
631  if (!_single_cmds_queue.empty())
632  {
633  _ttl_manager->writeSingleCommand(std::move(_single_cmds_queue.front()));
634  _single_cmds_queue.pop();
635  }
636  }
637 
638  {
639  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_conveyor_cmd_queue_mutex);
640  if (!_conveyor_cmds_queue.empty())
641  {
642  _ttl_manager->writeSingleCommand(std::move(_conveyor_cmds_queue.front()));
643  _conveyor_cmds_queue.pop();
644  }
645  }
646 
647  {
648  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_sync_cmd_queue_mutex);
649  if (!_sync_cmds_queue.empty())
650  {
651  _ttl_manager->writeSynchronizeCommand(std::move(_sync_cmds_queue.front()));
652  _sync_cmds_queue.pop();
653  }
654  }
655 
656  {
657  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_traj_cmd_mutex);
658  if (!_joint_trajectory_cmd.empty())
659  {
660  _ttl_manager->executeJointTrajectoryCmd(_joint_trajectory_cmd);
661  _joint_trajectory_cmd.clear();
662  }
663  }
664 }
665 
666 // *************
667 // Setters
668 // *************
669 
675 int TtlInterfaceCore::addJoint(const std::shared_ptr<common::model::JointState> &jointState)
676 {
677  // protect bus with mutex because of readFirmware version in addHardwareComponent
678  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
679  return _ttl_manager->addHardwareComponent(jointState);
680 }
681 
687 int TtlInterfaceCore::setTool(const std::shared_ptr<common::model::ToolState> &toolState)
688 {
689  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::TTL_READ_ERROR;
690 
691  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
692 
693  // try to find motor
694  if (_ttl_manager->ping(toolState->getId()))
695  {
696  // add motor as a new tool
697  result = _ttl_manager->addHardwareComponent(toolState);
698  }
699  else
700  {
701  ROS_WARN("TtlInterfaceCore::setTool - No tool found with motor id %d", toolState->getId());
702  }
703 
704  return result;
705 }
706 
711 void TtlInterfaceCore::unsetTool(uint8_t motor_id)
712 {
713  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::unsetTool - UnsetTool: id %d", motor_id);
714  _ttl_manager->removeHardwareComponent(motor_id);
715 }
716 
722 int TtlInterfaceCore::setEndEffector(const std::shared_ptr<common::model::EndEffectorState> &end_effector_state)
723 {
724  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::TTL_READ_ERROR;
725 
726  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
727 
728  result = _ttl_manager->addHardwareComponent(end_effector_state);
729  // try to find hw
730  if (_ttl_manager->ping(end_effector_state->getId()))
731  {
732  result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
733  }
734  else
735  {
736  ROS_WARN("TtlInterfaceCore::setEndEffector - No end effector found with id %d", end_effector_state->getId());
737  }
738  return result;
739 }
740 
746 int TtlInterfaceCore::setConveyor(const std::shared_ptr<common::model::ConveyorState> &state)
747 {
748  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
749 
750  if (!_ttl_manager->ping(state->getId()))
751  {
752  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::setConveyor - No conveyor found");
753  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::NO_CONVEYOR_FOUND;
754  }
755 
756  // add hw component before to get driver
757  auto result = _ttl_manager->addHardwareComponent(state);
758 
759  ROS_INFO("TtlInterfaceCore::setConveyor - setConveyor: id %d, err: %d", state->getId(), result);
760 
761  return result;
762 }
763 
769 void TtlInterfaceCore::unsetConveyor(uint8_t motor_id, uint8_t default_conveyor_id)
770 {
771  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::unsetConveyor - unsetConveyor: id %d", motor_id);
772 
773  auto state = getJointState(motor_id);
774  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == changeId(state->getHardwareType(), motor_id, default_conveyor_id))
775  {
776  // block control loop to avoid control loop called when removing conveyor is not finished yet
777  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
778  _ttl_manager->removeHardwareComponent(default_conveyor_id);
779  }
780  else
781  ROS_ERROR("TtlInterfaceCore::unsetConveyor : unable to change conveyor ID");
782 }
783 
791 int TtlInterfaceCore::changeId(common::model::EHardwareType motor_type, uint8_t old_id, uint8_t new_id)
792 {
793  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
794  if (COMM_SUCCESS == _ttl_manager->changeId(motor_type, old_id, new_id))
795  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
796 
797  ROS_ERROR("TtlInterfaceCore::changeId : unable to change conveyor ID");
798  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::TTL_WRITE_ERROR;
799 }
800 
804 void TtlInterfaceCore::clearSingleCommandQueue()
805 {
806  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_single_cmd_queue_mutex);
807 
808  while (!_single_cmds_queue.empty())
809  _single_cmds_queue.pop();
810 }
811 
815 void TtlInterfaceCore::clearConveyorCommandQueue()
816 {
817  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_conveyor_cmd_queue_mutex);
818 
819  while (!_conveyor_cmds_queue.empty())
820  _conveyor_cmds_queue.pop();
821 }
822 
826 void TtlInterfaceCore::clearSyncCommandQueue()
827 {
828  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_sync_cmd_queue_mutex);
829 
830  while (!_sync_cmds_queue.empty())
831  _sync_cmds_queue.pop();
832 }
833 
838 void TtlInterfaceCore::setTrajectoryControllerCommands(std::vector<std::pair<uint8_t, uint32_t>> &&cmd)
839 {
840  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_traj_cmd_mutex);
841 
842  _joint_trajectory_cmd = cmd;
843 } // NOLINT
844 
849 void TtlInterfaceCore::addSyncCommandToQueue(std::unique_ptr<common::model::ISynchronizeMotorCmd> &&cmd) // NOLINT
850 {
851  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_sync_cmd_queue_mutex);
852 
853  if (cmd->isValid())
854  {
855  _sync_cmds_queue.push(common::util::static_unique_ptr_cast<common::model::AbstractTtlSynchronizeMotorCmd>(std::move(cmd)));
856  }
857  else
858  ROS_WARN("TtlInterfaceCore::setSyncCommand : Invalid command %s", cmd->str().c_str());
859 }
860 
866 void TtlInterfaceCore::addSingleCommandToQueue(std::unique_ptr<common::model::ISingleMotorCmd> &&cmd) // NOLINT
867 {
868  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::addSingleCommandToQueue - %s", cmd->str().c_str());
869 
870  if (cmd->isValid())
871  {
872  if (cmd->getCmdType() == static_cast<int>(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_CONVEYOR))
873  {
874  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_conveyor_cmd_queue_mutex);
875  if (_conveyor_cmds_queue.size() > QUEUE_OVERFLOW)
876  ROS_WARN("TtlInterfaceCore::addCommandToQueue: Cmd queue overflow ! %d", static_cast<int>(_conveyor_cmds_queue.size()));
877  else
878  {
879  _conveyor_cmds_queue.push(common::util::static_unique_ptr_cast<common::model::AbstractTtlSingleMotorCmd>(std::move(cmd)));
880  }
881  }
882  else
883  {
884  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(_single_cmd_queue_mutex);
885  if (_single_cmds_queue.size() > QUEUE_OVERFLOW)
886  ROS_WARN("TtlInterfaceCore::addSingleCommandToQueue: dxl cmd queue overflow ! %d", static_cast<int>(_single_cmds_queue.size()));
887  else
888  {
889  _single_cmds_queue.push(common::util::static_unique_ptr_cast<common::model::AbstractTtlSingleMotorCmd>(std::move(cmd)));
890  }
891  }
892  }
893  else
894  {
895  ROS_WARN("TtlInterfaceCore::addSingleCommandToQueue : Invalid command %s", cmd->str().c_str());
896  }
897 }
898 
903 void TtlInterfaceCore::addSingleCommandToQueue(std::vector<std::unique_ptr<common::model::ISingleMotorCmd>> cmd)
904 {
905  for (auto &c : cmd)
906  addSingleCommandToQueue(std::move(c));
907 }

950 niryo_robot_msgs::BusState TtlInterfaceCore::getBusState() const
951 {
952  niryo_robot_msgs::BusState bus_state;
953 
954  string error;
955  bool connection;
956  vector<uint8_t> motor_id;
957 
958  _ttl_manager->getBusState(connection, motor_id, error);
959  bus_state.connection_status = connection;
960  bus_state.motor_id_connected = motor_id;
961  bus_state.error = error;
962  return bus_state;
963 }

968 void TtlInterfaceCore::waitSyncQueueFree()
969 {
970  while (!_sync_cmds_queue.empty())
971  {
972  ros::Duration(0.2).sleep();
973  }
974 }
975 
979 void TtlInterfaceCore::waitSingleQueueFree()
980 {
981  while (!_single_cmds_queue.empty())
982  {
983  ros::Duration(0.2).sleep();
984  }
985 }

997 bool TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackActivateLeds(niryo_robot_msgs::SetInt::Request &req, niryo_robot_msgs::SetInt::Response &res)
998 {
999  int led = req.value;
1000  string message;
1001 
1002  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
1003  int result = _ttl_manager->setLeds(led);
1004 
1005  res.status = result;
1006  res.message = message;
1007 
1008  // return response even request failed
1009  return true;
1010 }
1011 
1018 bool TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackReadCustomValue(ttl_driver::ReadCustomValue::Request &req, ttl_driver::ReadCustomValue::Response &res)
1019 {
1020  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
1021 
1022  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
1023  int value = 0;
1024  result = _ttl_manager->readCustomCommand(req.id, req.reg_address, value, req.byte_number);
1025 
1026  if (COMM_SUCCESS == result)
1027  {
1028  res.value = value;
1029  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Reading successful";
1030  result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
1031  }
1032  else
1033  {
1034  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Reading custom registry failed";
1035  }
1036 
1037  res.status = result;
1038  return true;
1039 }
1040 
1047 bool TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackWriteCustomValue(ttl_driver::WriteCustomValue::Request &req, ttl_driver::WriteCustomValue::Response &res)
1048 {
1049  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
1050 
1051  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
1052  result = _ttl_manager->sendCustomCommand(req.id, req.reg_address, req.value, req.byte_number);
1053 
1054  if (COMM_SUCCESS == result)
1055  {
1056  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Send custom command done";
1057  result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
1058  }
1059  else
1060  {
1061  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Send custom command failed";
1062  }
1063 
1064  res.status = result;
1065  return true;
1066 }
1067 
1074 bool TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackReadPIDValue(ttl_driver::ReadPIDValue::Request &req, ttl_driver::ReadPIDValue::Response &res)
1075 {
1076  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
1077 
1078  uint8_t id = req.id;
1079  uint16_t pos_p_gain{0};
1080  uint16_t pos_i_gain{0};
1081  uint16_t pos_d_gain{0};
1082 
1083  uint16_t vel_p_gain{0};
1084  uint16_t vel_i_gain{0};
1085 
1086  uint16_t ff1_gain{0};
1087  uint16_t ff2_gain{0};
1088 
1089  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
1090  if (COMM_SUCCESS == _ttl_manager->readMotorPID(id, pos_p_gain, pos_i_gain, pos_d_gain, vel_p_gain, vel_i_gain, ff1_gain, ff2_gain))
1091  {
1092  res.pos_p_gain = pos_p_gain;
1093  res.pos_i_gain = pos_i_gain;
1094  res.pos_d_gain = pos_d_gain;
1095  res.vel_p_gain = vel_p_gain;
1096  res.vel_i_gain = vel_i_gain;
1097  res.ff1_gain = ff1_gain;
1098  res.ff2_gain = ff2_gain;
1099 
1100  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Reading PID successful";
1101  result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
1102  }
1103  else
1104  {
1105  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Reading PID failed";
1106  }
1107 
1108  res.status = result;
1109 
1110  return true;
1111 }
1112 
1119 bool TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackWritePIDValue(ttl_driver::WritePIDValue::Request &req, ttl_driver::WritePIDValue::Response &res)
1120 {
1121  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
1122 
1123  auto dxl_cmd_pos_p = std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_PID, req.id,
1124  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{req.pos_p_gain, req.pos_i_gain, req.pos_d_gain, req.vel_p_gain, req.vel_i_gain,
1125  req.ff1_gain, req.ff2_gain, req.vel_profile, req.acc_profile});
1126 
1127  if (dxl_cmd_pos_p->isValid())
1128  {
1129  addSingleCommandToQueue(std::move(dxl_cmd_pos_p));
1130  result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
1131  }
1132 
1133  res.status = result;
1134 
1135  return true;
1136 }
1137 
1144 bool TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackReadVelocityProfile(ttl_driver::ReadVelocityProfile::Request &req, ttl_driver::ReadVelocityProfile::Response &res)
1145 {
1146  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
1147 
1148  uint8_t id = req.id;
1149 
1150  uint32_t v_start{1};
1151  uint32_t a_1{0};
1152  uint32_t v_1{0};
1153  uint32_t a_max{6000};
1154  uint32_t v_max{6};
1155  uint32_t d_max{6000};
1156  uint32_t d_1{0};
1157  uint32_t v_stop{2};
1158 
1159  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_control_loop_mutex);
1160  if (COMM_SUCCESS == _ttl_manager->readVelocityProfile(id, v_start, a_1, v_1, a_max, v_max, d_max, d_1, v_stop))
1161  {
1162  // converting from RPM and RPM-2
1163 
1164  // v in 0.01 RPM
1165  res.v_start = v_start / (RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
1166  res.a_1 = a_1 / RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ;
1167  res.v_1 = v_1 / (RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
1168  res.a_max = a_max / RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ;
1169  res.v_max = v_max / (RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
1170  res.d_max = d_max / RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ;
1171  res.d_1 = d_1 / RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ;
1172  res.v_stop = v_stop / (RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
1173 
1174  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Reading Velocity Profile successful";
1175  result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
1176  }
1177  else
1178  {
1179  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Reading Velocity Profile failed";
1180  }
1181 
1182  res.status = result;
1183 
1184  return true;
1185 }
1186 
1193 bool TtlInterfaceCore::_callbackWriteVelocityProfile(ttl_driver::WriteVelocityProfile::Request &req, ttl_driver::WriteVelocityProfile::Response &res)
1194 {
1195  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
1196 
1197  // converting into RPM and RPM-2
1198 
1199  // v in 0.01 RPM
1200  auto v_start = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.v_start * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
1201  auto a_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.a_1 * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
1202  auto v_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.v_1 * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
1203  auto a_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.a_max * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
1204  auto v_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.v_max * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
1205  auto d_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.d_max * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
1206  auto d_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.d_1 * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
1207  auto v_stop = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.v_stop * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
1208 
1209  auto profile_cmd = std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY_PROFILE, req.id,
1210  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{v_start, a_1, v_1, a_max, v_max, d_max, d_1, v_stop});
1211 
1212  if (profile_cmd->isValid())
1213  {
1214  addSingleCommandToQueue(std::move(profile_cmd));
1215  result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
1216  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Writing Velocity Profile successful";
1217  }
1218  else
1219  {
1220  res.message = "TtlInterfaceCore - Writing Velocity Profile failed";
1221  }
1222 
1223  res.status = result;
1224 
1225  return true;
1226 }
1227

1230  std_msgs::Bool msg;
1231  msg.data = getCollisionStatus();
1232  _collision_status_publisher.publish(msg);
1233 }
